title: String Reversal and Palindrome Check
description: Write a program that takes a string input from the user, reverses the string, and checks if the original string is a palindrome. A palindrome is a string that reads the same backward as forward. The program should print the reversed string and a message indicating whether the original string is a palindrome or not.
sample_output: Reversed string: madam. The original string is a palindrome.
